title: Bug 17504Local history preference "Entries per file" can only be lowered, never increased
description: Doing so results in amessage "Above maximum Entries per file: 10".
OB: Bug 17504Local history preference "Entries per file" can only be lowered, never increased build F1set the "Entries per file" local history preference from the default 50 youprobably have now to 10restartYou can no longer set the value higher than 10.
